original_title: NTR同窓会 愛する妻と最悪な元彼の気が狂いそうな胸糞浮気映像。 星宮一花
overview: I wish I hadn't let my wife go to that class reunion... I've heard about the number of guys I dated before I got married, and how many people experienced it, but I never thought I'd dated such a perverted bastard... Ichika was at the class reunion. Former boyfriend Uchida remembers the time when he was dating Ichika, makes him drink strong alcohol, and says, "Continue with the past obscene act," and forcibly fucks Ichika. Ichika, who had troubles with her husband's sexual activity, remembers her past sexual activity with her perverted ex-boyfriend.
title: NTR Class Reunion – A Disgusting Video Showing The Wife I Love Cheating With Her Terrible Ex Boyfriend. Ichika Hoshimiya
